overview: In support of the victory of the Unidad Popular, artists create a mural on the Paseo Bulnes, located in front of the Palacio la Moneda. Among the muralists are José Balmes, Gracia Barros and Guillermo Núñez.

production_companies.name: Cine Experimental de la Universidad de Chile
Departamento de Cine de la Universidad de Chile

title: Pintando con el pueblo
